Markup: todays-menu/todays-menu.twig 
<!--MENUS AREA-->
<section class="menus-area section-padding" id="menu">
  <div class="container wow fadeIn">
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="area-title text-center">
          <h2>{{ pre_title }}</h2>
          <h3>{{ title }}</h3>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
        <div class="food-menu-list-menu">
          <ul>
            <li class="filter active" data-filter="all">All</li>
            {% for category in categories %}
            <li class="filter" data-filter=".{{ category.slug }}">{{ category.name }}</li>
            {% endfor %}
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row food-menu-list">
      {% for item in items %}
      <div class="mix col-md-3 col-lg-3 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 single-menu {{ item.categories|join(' ') }}">
        <div class="food-menu-img">
          <a href="{{ item.image.src }}" class="menu-popup" data-effect="mfp-zoom-out"><img src="{{ item.thumbnail.src }}" alt="{{ item.thumbnail.alt }}"></a>
        </div>
        <div class="food-menu-details">
          <h4>{{ item.title }}</h4>
          <p class="menu-price">{{ item.price }}</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
<!--MENUS AREA END-->
Source: todays-menu/todays-menu.scss, line 1
